name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Invity PRO for Facebook Invites Events&Pages

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Ultimate tool for inviting friends to Events & Pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sept 13th 2017 - 5.0v

   • Updated to latest Facebook changes.
   • Works for Events and Pages
   • Works for Invites to Post's Likes *PRO*
   • Autoscroll
 
Don't waste your time by clicking all your friends to invite them to Events or Pages.

Invity will help you click them all automatically!
It works with all Facebook recent changes to Invite Boxes

A brand new feature is that you can Invite people who liked your Post on your Page!
